comment.author: 8337233@N06
comment._content: Wow, is that really the same corner only 3 years later?!!

comment.author: 34432084@N00
comment._content: Crazy, ain't it? I didn't think this was the same view at first. But all the building heights and proportions down the block check out... and you can still see the 45-degree angle of the corner building beneath the archways. Woah... and I just now noticed that the balcony was there before!
